speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: SCENE III. A monastery.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text_entry: Enter DUKE VINCENTIO and FRIAR THOMAS

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: No, holy father; throw away that thought;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Believe not that the dribbling dart of love

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Can pierce a complete bosom. Why I desire thee

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To give me secret harbour, hath a purpose

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: More grave and wrinkled than the aims and ends

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Of burning youth.

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: May your grace speak of it?

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: My holy sir, none better knows than you

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How I have ever loved the life removed

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And held in idle price to haunt assemblies

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Where youth, and cost, and witless bravery keeps.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have deliver'd to Lord Angelo,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: A man of stricture and firm abstinence,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: My absolute power and place here in Vienna,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And he supposes me travell'd to Poland;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For so I have strew'd it in the common ear,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And so it is received. Now, pious sir,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: You will demand of me why I do this?

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: Gladly, my lord.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: We have strict statutes and most biting laws.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The needful bits and curbs to headstrong weeds,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Which for this nineteen years we have let slip;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Even like an o'ergrown lion in a cave,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That goes not out to prey. Now, as fond fathers,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Having bound up the threatening twigs of birch,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Only to stick it in their children's sight

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For terror, not to use, in time the rod

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Becomes more mock'd than fear'd; so our decrees,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Dead to infliction, to themselves are dead;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And liberty plucks justice by the nose;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: The baby beats the nurse, and quite athwart

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Goes all decorum.

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: It rested in your grace

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: To unloose this tied-up justice when you pleased:

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: And it in you more dreadful would have seem'd

speaker: FRIAR THOMAS
text_entry: Than in Lord Angelo.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I do fear, too dreadful:

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Sith 'twas my fault to give the people scope,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: 'Twould be my tyranny to strike and gall them

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: For what I bid them do: for we bid this be done,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: When evil deeds have their permissive pass

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And not the punishment. Therefore indeed, my father,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I have on Angelo imposed the office;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Who may, in the ambush of my name, strike home,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: And yet my nature never in the fight

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: To do in slander. And to behold his sway,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: I will, as 'twere a brother of your order,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Visit both prince and people: therefore, I prithee,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Supply me with the habit and instruct me

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: How I may formally in person bear me

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Like a true friar. More reasons for this action

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: At our more leisure shall I render you;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Only, this one: Lord Angelo is precise;

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Stands at a guard with envy; scarce confesses

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: That his blood flows, or that his appetite

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Is more to bread than stone: hence shall we see,

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: If power change purpose, what our seemers be.

speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
text_entry: Exeunt
